constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 153 (Thursday, September 22, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. WESTERMAN:
H.R. 8981.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Pursuant to clause 7 of Rule XII of the Rules of the House
of Representatives, the following statement is submitted
regarding the specific powers granted to Congress in the
Constitution to enact the accompanying bill or joint
resolution. Congress has the authority to enact this
legislation pursuant to the powers granted under Article IV,
Section 3, Clause 2 and Article I, Section 8, Clause 18 of
the United States Constitution.
[Page H8114]
